system.description:
Prerequisite: Wrathful Bargainer feat

You have learned to make your fury and eldritch power supplement each other in novel new ways. You gain the following benefits:

  • If you are concentrating on a warlock spell, you may enter a rage without losing concentration.

  • When you end your rage, you regain a spell point. When your total combined berserker and warlock levels reach 15, you regain 2 spell points instead.

  • You gain the following feature:

Ferocious Blast

When you select this feat, choose two energy types from the following list: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder. While raging, you may have your Eldritch Blast damage die increase by one step, but it deals one of the selected damage types instead of force

source.name: Thematic Toolkit: Judge, Jury, and Executioner
